bibl.title: Alfonso Gagliardi v. T.W. Lynch. Order
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the Matter of the Application of Alfonso Gagliardi, for Writ of Habeas Corpus.

This case coming on to be heard upon the petition of the above named, Alfonso Gagliardi, and affidavit filed in support thereof, appearing by his counsel, Clay Allen, and upon the return thereto of T.W. Lynch, Esq., Acting Commissioner of Immigration for the Western District of Washington, appearing by the United States Attorney for the Western District of Washington; and the argument of counsel having been heard; and the Court being now fully advised in the premises;
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED AND DIRECTED:
FIRST: That the Court finds the matters and things set forth in the petition herein to be true in accordance with the Memorandum Opinion of the Court heretofore filed in this cause.

SECOND: That a Writ of Habeas Corpus be and the same is hereby directed to issue out of this Court to the above named T.W. Lynch, Esq., Acting Commissioner of Immigration for the Western District of Washington, directing that the said T.W. Lynch, Esq., shall have and produce the body of the above named Alfonso Gagliardi before this Court.

THIRD: That the above named Alfonso Gagliardi, be and he hereby is discharged from the custody and control of the above named T.W. Lynch, Esq., Acting Commissioner of Immigration for the Western District of Washington.

FOURTH: That the bond of the above named petitioner, Alfonso Gagliardi, in the sum of ONE THOUSAND ($1,000) DOLLARS heretofore filed in this cause, be and the same is hereby discharged, and the surety thereof discharged from liability thereunder, and said certain bonds in the sum of $1,000.00 heretofore held in the custody of the above named T.W. Lynch, Esq.,Acting Commissioner of Immigration for the Western District of Washington, and heretofore assigned to the Clerk of this Court, be and they hereby are discharged and ordered delivered to the surety on said bond, Angelo Marra, or his order.
To all of which the exerpts and and exception is
DONE IN OPEN COURT this 5 day of January, 1922.
Service of the within foregoing Order by copies hereby acknowledged this day of January, 1922, and consent that the same may be presented without further notice.
In the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington
In the Matter of the Application of Alfonso Gagliardi, for Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Filed in the United States District Court
